attributes.action: Consider the renationalisation of the UK's rail network
attributes.additional_details:
Overly complicated and expensive fares, constant price rises with only a negligible improvement in the quality if service. The UK has by most standards the worst rail service in Europe

There has been no proven economic benefit to the privatisation of rail in the UK. The only benefit, in real terms, has been seen by politicians and board members.

This petition at the very least calls for a review to be held in to the benefits of nationalising our out of step rail services
